programme.sub-title: Sri Lanka v Bangladesh-2nd Test, Day Two
programme.desc: Sri Lanka v Bangladesh. Coverage of day two of the Second Test in the two-match series at Sinhalese Sports Club Cricket Ground in Colombo. The visitors have never won a Test series against Sri Lanka and have only ever won one match against their hosts in their history. That one victory for Bangladesh came in March 2017 when they came away with a four-wicket victory to draw a two-match series 1-1
